00058 template<
00059   class KeyType = uint32_t,
00060   class ValueType = uint64_t,
00061   size_t ENTRY_POW = 16,
00062   class HASH_FUNCTION = simple_hash,
00063   int INIT_BUCKET_SIZE=64
00064   >
00065 class Map : public AccessMethod<KeyType, ValueType>
00066 {
00067   enum {ENTRY_SIZE = (2<<ENTRY_POW)};
00068   enum {ENTRY_MASK = ENTRY_SIZE-1};
00069   enum {ENTRY_GROW = 5};
00070   
00071   typedef DataType<KeyType,ValueType> DataType;
00072   typedef Map<KeyType, ValueType, ENTRY_POW, HASH_FUNCTION> SelfType;
00073 
00074   typedef boost::archive::binary_iarchive iarchive;
00075   typedef boost::archive::binary_oarchive oarchive;
00076   
00077   struct KEY_
00078   {
00079     KeyType k_;
00080     inline KEY_()
00081     {
00082       k_ = (KeyType)-1;
00083     }
00084 
00085     inline KEY_(const KeyType& k)
00086     {
00087       k_ = k;
00088     }
00089 
00090     bool operator != (const KeyType& k)const
00091     {
00092       return k_!=k;
00093     }
00094 
00095     bool operator == (const KeyType& k)const
00096     {
00097       return k_==k;
00098     }
00099     
00100   };
00101   
00102   struct ENTRY_
00103   {
00104     KEY_* pK_;
00105     size_t*  pIdx_;
00106   };
00107   
00108 public:
00109   Map():entry_size_(ENTRY_SIZE)
00110   {
00111     entry_.pK_ = new KEY_[entry_size_];    
00112     entry_.pIdx_ = new size_t[entry_size_];
00113     count_ = 0;
00114   }
00115 
00116   ~Map()
00117   {
00118     delete entry_.pK_;
00119     count_ = 0;
00120     delete entry_.pIdx_;
00121     dataVec_.clear();
00122   }
00123 
00124   void clear()
00125   {
00126     delete entry_.pK_;
00127     delete entry_.pIdx_;
00128     count_ = 0;
00129     
00130     dataVec_.clear();
00131   }
00132     
00133   bool insert(const DataType& data) {
00134     return insert(data.get_key(), data.get_value());
00135   }
00136 
00137   bool update(const DataType& dat) {
00138     return update(dat.get_key(), dat.get_value());
00139   }
00140 
00141   int num_items() const
00142   {
00143     return count_;
00144   }
00145 
00146   void display(std::ostream & os=std::cout)
00147   {
00148   }
00149 
00150   bool insert(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& v)
00151   {
00152     KeyType idx = key & ENTRY_MASK;
00153 
00154     while (idx<entry_size_ && entry_.pK_[idx] != (KeyType)-1)
00155     {
00156       if (entry_.pK_[idx] == key)
00157         return false;
00158       
00159       idx ++;
00160     }
00161 
00162     if (idx == entry_size_)
00163     {
00164       entry_.pK_ = (KEY_*)realloc(entry_.pK_, (entry_size_+ENTRY_GROW)*sizeof(KEY_));
00165       
00166       for (KeyType i=0; i<ENTRY_GROW; i++)
00167         entry_.pK_[entry_size_+i] = (KeyType)-1;
00168       
00169       entry_.pIdx_ =  (size_t*)realloc((void*)entry_.pIdx_, (entry_size_+ENTRY_GROW)*sizeof(size_t));
00170 
00171       entry_size_ += ENTRY_GROW;
00172     }
00173 
00174     entry_.pK_[idx] = key;
00175     entry_.pIdx_[idx] = dataVec_.size();
00176     dataVec_.push_back(v);
00177     count_++;
00178     
00179     return true;
00180   }
00181 
00182   ValueType* find(const KeyType& key)
00183   {    
00184     KeyType idx = key & ENTRY_MASK;
00185 
00186     while (idx<entry_size_)
00187     {
00188       if (entry_.pK_[idx] == (KeyType)-1)
00189         return NULL;
00190       
00191       if (entry_.pK_[idx] == key)
00192       {
00193         return &dataVec_[entry_.pIdx_[idx]];
00194       }
00195 
00196       idx ++;
00197     }
00198 
00199     return NULL;
00200   }
00201 
00202   bool del(const KeyType& key)
00203   {
00204     
00205     KeyType idx = key & ENTRY_MASK;
00206 
00207     while (idx<entry_size_)
00208     {
00209       if (entry_.pK_[idx] == (KeyType)-1)
00210         return false;
00211       
00212       if (entry_.pK_[idx] == key)
00213       {
00214         entry_.pK_[idx] = (KeyType)-1;
00215         count_--;
00216         return true;
00217       }
00218 
00219       idx ++;
00220     }
00221 
00222     return false;
00223   }
00224 
00225   bool update(const KeyType& key, const ValueType& v)
00226   {
00227     KeyType idx = key & ENTRY_MASK;
00228 
00229     while (idx<entry_size_)
00230     {
00231       if (entry_.pK_[idx] == (KeyType)-1)
00232         return false;
00233       
00234       if (entry_.pK_[idx] == key)
00235       {
00236         entry_.pIdx_[idx] = dataVec_.size();
00237         dataVec_.push_back(v);
00238         return true;
00239       }
00240       
00241       idx ++;
00242     }
00243     
00244     return true;
00245   }

00248   template<class Archive>
00249   void save(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)  const
00250   {
00251     ar & entry_size_;
00252     ar.save_binary(entry_.pK_, entry_size_*sizeof(KEY_));
00253     ar.save_binary(entry_.pIdx_, entry_size_*sizeof(size_t));
00254     ar & count_;
00255     ar & dataVec_;
00256   }
00257 
00258     
00259   template<class Archive>
00260   void load(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)
00261   {
00262     clear();
00263     
00264     ar & entry_size_;
00265     entry_.pK_ = new KEY_[entry_size_];    
00266     entry_.pIdx_ = new size_t[entry_size_];
00267     
00268     ar.load_binary(entry_.pK_, entry_size_*sizeof(KEY_));
00269     ar.load_binary(entry_.pIdx_, entry_size_*sizeof(size_t));
00270     
00271     ar & count_;
00272     ar & dataVec_;
00273   }

00316 #define PAGE_EXPANDING 1
00317 #define EXACT_EXPANDING 0
00318 
00319 template<
00320   class ValueType,
00321   size_t ENTRY_POW,
00322   class HASH_FUNCTION,
00323   int INIT_BUCKET_SIZE
00324   >
00325 class Map<string, ValueType, ENTRY_POW, HASH_FUNCTION, INIT_BUCKET_SIZE>
00326   : public AccessMethod<string, ValueType>
00327 {
00328   enum {ENTRY_SIZE = (2<<ENTRY_POW)};
00329   enum {ENTRY_MASK = ENTRY_SIZE-1};
00330   enum {EXPAND = PAGE_EXPANDING};
00331 
00332   typedef DataType<string,ValueType> DataType;
00333   typedef Map<string, ValueType, ENTRY_POW, HASH_FUNCTION> SelfType;
00334 
00335   typedef boost::archive::binary_iarchive iarchive;
00336   typedef boost::archive::binary_oarchive oarchive;
00337   
00338 public:
00339   Map()
00340   {
00341     for(size_t i=0; i<ENTRY_SIZE; i++)
00342     {
00343       entry_[i] = NULL;
00344     }
00345     count_ = 0;
00346   }
00347 
00348   ~Map()
00349   {
00350     
00351     for(size_t i=0; i<ENTRY_SIZE; i++)
00352     {
00353       if (entry_[i]!=NULL) delete entry_[i];
00354       entry_[i] = NULL;
00355     }
00356     
00357   }
00358 
00359   void clear()
00360   {
00361       
00362     for(size_t i=0; i<ENTRY_SIZE; i++)
00363     {
00364       if (entry_[i]!=NULL) delete entry_[i];
00365       entry_[i] = NULL;
00366     }
00367     dataVec_.clear();
00368     count_ = 0;
00369   }
00370     
00371   bool insert(const DataType& data) {
00372     return insert(data.get_key(), data.get_value());
00373   }
00374 
00375   bool update(const DataType& dat) {
00376     return update(dat.get_key(), dat.get_value());
00377   }
00378 
00379   int num_items() const
00380   {
00381     return count_;
00382   }
00383 
00384   void display(std::ostream & os=std::cout)
00385   {
00386     for(size_t i=0; i<ENTRY_SIZE; i++)
00387     {
00388       char* pBkt = entry_[i];
00389 
00390       if (pBkt ==NULL)
00391         continue;
00392 
00393       os<<endl<<i<<" Entry===========\n";
00394 
00395       uint32_t bs = *(uint32_t*)(pBkt);
00396       uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)(pBkt)+1);
00397       os<<"bucket size: "<<bs<<endl;
00398       os<<"content len: "<<content_len<<endl;
00399 
00400       uint32_t p = sizeof(uint32_t)*2;;
00401       while (p < content_len)
00402       {
00403         size_t len = *((size_t*)(pBkt+p));
00404         p += sizeof (size_t);
00405         os<<"("<<len<<")";
00406 
00407         for (size_t j=0; j<len; j++)
00408           os<<pBkt[p+j];
00409         p += len;
00410 
00411         os<<"=>"<<*((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p))<<endl;
00412         p += sizeof (uint64_t);
00413       }
00414     }
00415   }
00416 
00417   bool insert(const string& str, const ValueType& v)
00418   {
00419     size_t ksize = str.length();
00420 
00421     uint32_t idx = HASH_FUNCTION::getValue(str.c_str(),ksize) & ENTRY_MASK;
00422 
00423     uint64_t value = dataVec_.size();
00424     
00425     dataVec_.push_back(v);
00426 
00427     char* pBkt = entry_[idx];
00428 
00429     if (pBkt == NULL)
00430     {
00431       entry_[idx] = pBkt = new char[INIT_BUCKET_SIZE];
00432       *(uint32_t*)(pBkt) = 64;
00433       *((uint32_t*)(pBkt)+1) = 2*sizeof(uint32_t);
00434       good_entries_.push_back(idx);
00435     }
00436     else
00437     {
00438       //cout<<"does it exist?";
00439       uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)pBkt+1);
00440       uint32_t p = sizeof(uint32_t)*2;;
00441       while (p < content_len)
00442       {
00443         size_t len = *((size_t*)(pBkt+p));
00444 
00445         if (len != ksize )
00446         {
00447           p += sizeof (size_t) + len + sizeof(uint64_t);
00448           continue;
00449         }
00450 
00451         p += sizeof (size_t);
00452 
00453         size_t j=0;
00454         for (; j<len; j++)
00455           if (str[j] != pBkt[p+j])
00456             break;
00457 
00458         if (j == len)
00459         {
00460           *(uint64_t*)(pBkt+p+j) = value;
00461           return true;
00462         }
00463 
00464         p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00465       }
00466     }
00467 
00468     //cout<<"==============\n";
00469     uint32_t bs = *(uint32_t*)(pBkt);
00470     uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)pBkt+1);
00471 
00472     if (bs-content_len<ksize+sizeof(size_t)+sizeof(uint64_t))
00473     {
00474       bs += EXPAND ==PAGE_EXPANDING? INIT_BUCKET_SIZE: ksize+sizeof(size_t)+sizeof(uint64_t);
00475       //content_len += str.length()+sizeof(uint32_t);
00476       pBkt = new char[bs];
00477       memcpy(pBkt, entry_[idx], *(uint32_t*)(entry_[idx]) );
00478       delete entry_[idx];
00479       entry_[idx] = pBkt;
00480     }
00481 
00482     *((size_t*)(pBkt+content_len)) = ksize;
00483     content_len += sizeof(size_t);
00484     memcpy(pBkt+content_len, str.c_str(), ksize);
00485     content_len += ksize;
00486     *((uint64_t*)(pBkt+content_len)) = value;
00487     content_len += sizeof(uint64_t);
00488 
00489     *(uint32_t*)(pBkt) = bs;
00490     *((uint32_t*)pBkt+1) = content_len;
00491 
00492     count_++;
00493     return true;
00494 
00495   }
00496 
00497   ValueType* find(const string& str)
00498   {
00499     size_t ksize = str.length();
00500     
00501     uint32_t idx = HASH_FUNCTION::getValue(str.c_str(),ksize) & ENTRY_MASK;
00502                 
00503     char* pBkt = entry_[idx];
00504     if (pBkt == NULL)
00505       return NULL;
00506 
00507     uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)(pBkt)+1);
00508 
00509     uint32_t p = sizeof(uint32_t)*2;;
00510     while (p < content_len)
00511     {
00512       size_t len = *((size_t*)(pBkt+p));
00513       p += sizeof (size_t);
00514       if (ksize != len)
00515       {
00516         p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00517         continue;
00518       }
00519 
00520       size_t i = 0;
00521       for (; i<len; i++)
00522       {
00523         if (pBkt[p+i]!=str[i])
00524           break;
00525       }
00526       if (i != len)
00527       {
00528         p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00529         continue;
00530       }
00531 
00532       p += len;
00533 
00534       if (*((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p))!=(uint64_t)-1)
00535         return &(dataVec_[*((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p))]);
00536       else
00537         return NULL;
00538 
00539     }
00540 
00541     return NULL;
00542 
00543   }
00544 
00545   bool del(const string& str)
00546   {
00547     size_t ksize = str.length();
00548     
00549     uint32_t idx = HASH_FUNCTION::getValue(str.c_str(),ksize) & ENTRY_MASK;
00550                 
00551     char* pBkt = entry_[idx];
00552     if (pBkt ==NULL)
00553       return -1;
00554 
00555     uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)(pBkt)+1);
00556 
00557     uint32_t p = sizeof(uint32_t)*2;;
00558     while (p < content_len)
00559     {
00560       size_t len = *((size_t*)(pBkt+p));
00561       p += sizeof (size_t);
00562       if (ksize != len)
00563       {
00564         p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00565         continue;
00566       }
00567 
00568       size_t i = 0;
00569       for (; i<len; i++)
00570       {
00571         if (pBkt[p+i]!=str[i])
00572           break;
00573       }
00574       if (i != len)
00575       {
00576         p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00577         continue;
00578       }
00579 
00580       p += len;
00581 
00582       *((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p)) = (uint64_t)-1;
00583 
00584       count_ --;
00585       return true;
00586     }
00587 
00588     return false;
00589   }
00590 
00591   bool update(const string& str, const ValueType& v)
00592   {
00593     size_t ksize = str.length();
00594     uint32_t idx = HASH_FUNCTION::getValue(str.c_str(),ksize) & ENTRY_MASK;
00595                 
00596     char* pBkt = entry_[idx];
00597 
00598     if (pBkt ==NULL)
00599       return -1;
00600 
00601     uint32_t content_len = *((uint32_t*)(pBkt)+1);
00602 
00603     uint32_t p = sizeof(uint32_t)*2;;
00604     while (p < content_len)
00605     {
00606       size_t len = *((size_t*)(pBkt+p));
00607       p += sizeof (size_t);
00608       if (ksize != len)
00609       {
00610         p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00611         continue;
00612       }
00613 
00614       size_t i = 0;
00615 
00616       for (; i<len; i++)
00617       {
00618         if (pBkt[p+i]!=str[i])
00619           break;
00620       }
00621       if (i != len)
00622       {
00623         p += len + sizeof (uint64_t);
00624         continue;
00625       }
00626 
00627       p += len;
00628 
00629       if (*((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p)) != (uint64_t)-1)
00630       {
00631         dataVec_[*((uint64_t*)(pBkt+p))] = v;
00632         return true;
00633       }
00634       else
00635         return false;
00636     }
00637 
00638     return false;
00639   }

00641 friend class boost::serialization::access;
00642   template<class Archive>
00643   void save(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)  const
00644   {
00645     ar & good_entries_;
00646       
00647     for (uint64_t i=0; i<good_entries_.size();i++)
00648     {
00649       char* pBkt = entry_[good_entries_[i]];
00650       
00651       uint32_t bs = *(uint32_t*)(pBkt);
00652 
00653       ar & bs;
00654       ar.save_binary(pBkt, bs);
00655     }
00656       
00657     ar & count_ & dataVec_;
00658   }
00659 
00660     
00661   template<class Archive>
00662   void load(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)
00663   {
00664 
00665     ar & good_entries_;
00666       
00667     for (uint64_t i=0; i<good_entries_.size();i++)
00668     {
00669       uint32_t bs;
00670       ar & bs;
00671 
00672       entry_[good_entries_[i]] = new char[bs];
00673       ar.load_binary(entry_[good_entries_[i]], bs);
00674         
00675     }
00676       
00677     ar & count_  & dataVec_;
00678   }
